digitalAssetContract.condition: Digital Bitcoin Tokens are backed by actual bitcoins held in reserve by Vancouver Bitcoin at 14Ch4z1asqNYvisoKzY4NTTXL3PTHHxKhn on the Bitcoin blockchain.
Vancouver Bitcoin's reserves can be audited at anytime by viewing 14Ch4z1asqNYvisoKzY4NTTXL3PTHHxKhn on the Bitcoin blockchain.
Digital Bitcoin Tokens can be purchased with bitcoin for an agreed upon exchange rate at vanbtc.ca/ot/purchase.
Digital Bitcoin Tokens can be used to redeem bitcoins at vanbtc.ca/ot/redeem.
Issuance and redemption will be performed for a small fee by Vancouver Bitcoin, this fee pays for administration and server expenses.
The Issuer reserves the right to buy back all outstanding currency, thereby terminating the use of this instrument.
Vancouver Bitcoin is in no way liable for the Digital Bitcoin Tokens that it mints and issues; however, Vancouver Bitcoin will buy back any Digital Bitcoin Tokens it has issued.

The total quantity of Digital Bitcoin Tokens minted by Vancouver Bitcoin will be the exact amount of bitcoin held in Vancouver Bitcoin's reserve account at 14Ch4z1asqNYvisoKzY4NTTXL3PTHHxKhn on the Bitcoin blockchain. Vancouver Bitcoin mints Digital Bitcoin Tokens from actual bitcoinâ€”JUST LIKE GOLD MINTS MINT GOLD COINS OUT OF ACTUAL GOLD.
The purchase and exchange of Digital Bitcoin Tokens are conducted on the basis of strong privacy.
